NumberHound

About

NumberHound is a blog focused on sports analytics and telling stories with data. NumberHound was founded and is operated by Chris Smitten. NumberHound’s logo was created by Kyrsten Lofts.

Data

Data for all posts on NumberHound can be found in Github repositories. The data in these repositories are continually updated, and new data is added whenever possible. Anyone is welcome to use this data for their own projects.

Currently NumberHound have data on the following topics:

  • Hockey
  • Football
  • Other

Data on football, soccer, economics, crime, and esports is coming soon.

Any code used in R, Python, or other languages for the work posted on NumberHound can also be found on Github
